text: Kampong Thom is a province in Cambodia. The capital city is Steung Saen Municipality on the banks of the Stung Sen River. Kampong Thom in Khmer means 'great port'. Tonl√© Sap Biosphere Reserve is in the province. title: Kampong Thom province
